about_the_game:
The inn is a four-story building, two of which are built underground and two above the ground. The entrance door is located in the middle and opens to a staircase that leads down to the first underground level. The counter and most tables are located here. Surrounded by a railing opposite the counter, a grandstand with an excellent view of the pit at the lowest level, where dueling sometimes occurs. There is also a storage room, smaller rooms, and a bathroom and toilet on the lowest level. The upper two levels rise tower-like above the counter and contain two large luxury rooms for the more affluent.

This DLC contains 2 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

The inn is a four-story building, two of which are built underground and two above the ground. The entrance door is located in the middle and opens to a staircase that leads down to the first underground level. The counter and most tables are located here. Surrounded by a railing opposite the counter, a grandstand with an excellent view of the pit at the lowest level, where dueling sometimes occurs. There is also a storage room, smaller rooms, and a bathroom and toilet on the lowest level. The upper two levels rise tower-like above the counter and contain two large luxury rooms for the more affluent.

This DLC contains 2 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Tavern Variations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
